title: 神奇宝贝mod更新后崩溃
author: 栗籽i
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-20 14:23 编辑 

我以前是用3.3.7版本的神奇宝贝mod，后来想升级成3.5.1，可是试了一下，服务器就崩溃了，我以为是版本太高了，就换成用3.4.0，可还是崩溃了= =
附上错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...
Time: 16-2-20 下午12:13
Description: Exception in server tick loop
cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraftforge/event/world/BlockEvent$PlaceEvent

 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.EventSubscriber.handleEvent(EventSubscriber.java:74)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.SynchronizedEventSubscriber.handleEvent(SynchronizedEventSubscriber.java:47)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatch(EventBus.java:322)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatchQueuedEvents(EventBus.java:304)

 at cpw.mods.fml.common.LoadController.distributeStateMessage(LoadController.java:118)
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.preinitializeMods(Loader.java:513)
 ... 5 more
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraftforge.event.world.BlockEvent$PlaceEvent
 at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:188)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)

 ... 36 more
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content: 服务器核心过旧 更换新版本

replies.author: 栗籽i
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-20 14:22 编辑 
yangoo 发表于 2016-2-20 13:15
服务器核心过旧 更换新版本
我直接把核心mod删了，然后重启之后继续崩溃
